segments.text: I just moved into my apartment , and the plumbing is not working .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you describe the plumbing problems you are having ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The bathtub barely drains at all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , the bathroom plumbing needs looking at . What about the kitchen plumbing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Neither the kitchen nor the bathroom plumbing is working well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Has this problem been going on for a long time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It just started happening last night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will be coming over to look at it this afternoon . Will you be there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can always use my key to get in , but I would prefer that you be there .
segments.speaker: S2
